# RSA 1

## Challenge

The text file give us the informations:

p: 
q: 
c: 

e: 65537

# Challenge

THe following code give us the solution.

```python
import Crypto
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto import Random
import ast


p = 
q =  
c =  

e =  65537

# calculate n
n = p*q

# calculate phi
phi = (p-1)*(q-1)

# calculate e
e = 65537

# calculate d
d = Crypto.Util.number.inverse(e, phi)

# message
m = pow(c, d, n)

# convert m to hex and then to ascii
print(m.to_bytes((m.bit_length() + 7) // 8, 'big').decode())
```
